entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #46964
  • Databinding does not work in shadow dom #46961
  • Unexplained custom model binding / validation behaviour #46960
  • A very simple project to publish SignalR message to Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.Redis #46958
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plaintext #46952
  • Razor Runtime Compilation should always generate embedded PDB's. #46948
    Backlog
  • Blazor Server Fails to Load blazor.server.js #46947

Closed

  • Default ExceptionHandlerMiddleware should have an option to suppress log output #46962
  • Add Name Attribute to EditForm EditContext cascading parameter. Doing it capable to implement components using current DataAnnotationsValidator when multiple CascadingValues are required. #45598
  • Official builds failing due to binlog2sln issue #46942
  • Blazor @Key parameter causes control focus to be lost on mobile / touch devices #46924
  • Blazor Server Web Application performance issue #46950
  • CLI Hot reload for Blazor wasm still doesn't work in .NET 7 #45190
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in `ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup` #46143
    8.0-preview3
  • Update `<ValidationSummary />` to add `CssClass` and pass additional attributes to the generated DOM element #46461
    Backlog
  • ContentHttpResult(string? content, string? contentType, int? statusCode) should be public #46959
  • #45577 also exists in .net 6 #46635
  • View component not being rendered using tag helper syntax #46740
  • Introduction of a new ASP.NET Core application project template - ASP.NET Core App with TailwindCSS framework #46745
  • Cannot wrap/override default IModelBinderFactory implementation #46938
  • Blazor Server RedirectToPage results in ambiguous multiple matches #46721
  • Missing JWT token with Safari (macOS and iOS) #45501
  • [Blazor] Make IsKnownImmutableType return true for enum #42891
    Backlog
  • Tag helpers break dotnet watch hot reload #43593
  • SignalR disconnect doesn't fire immediately #46661
  • Blazor: BindConverter.TryConvertTo<Guid> throws an exception #33587
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity #46968
    area-blazor
  • Call Yarn Install a second time if first one fails #46965
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2125600 #46963
    area-mvc
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d925117` to `2d4f208` #46957
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `f6fabbb` to `3583fc4` #46956
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d925117` to `2d4f208` #46955
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `0c5a96b` to `dbfe71c` #46954
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Blazor SSR benchmark #46953
  • Remove extra English installer files #46951
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers

Merged

  • Update sourceIndexPackageVersion #46946
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Avoid trying to use _hotReloadAgent variable before it is initialized #46916
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46716
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Add TryParse support for route parameters. #46921
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    blocked, area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview3
  • Tidy up some irregularities in certificate reloading #46819
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • [RDG] Support serializing polymorphic response types with STJ #46791
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update TryParse code gen to use CodeWriter. #46928
    area-runtime
  • Eliminate framework use of 'IJSUnmarshalledRuntime' #46693
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview3
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Correct a few nullable annotations #46911
    area-runtime
  • ApiAuthorizationDbContext.cs missing ServerSideSessions Patch #45145
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
    area-blazor
  • [Web.JS] call mono_wasm_gc_lock in MonoHeapLock #46909
    area-blazor
  • SSR as library #46935
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix not supporting JSON name in querystring names #46750
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix known type messages in querystring values #46752
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
